ad_text: Nurse Advantage Sponsored Nurse Advantage (a Care Advantage Inc. company), the region's most experienced healthcare supplemental staffing firm is looking to hire a FLEXIBLE part-time or full-time Personal Care Assistant (PCA), Skilled Nurses, and Medical Technicians to provide healthcare services to our clients throughout the greater Richmond area. We work with clients that have positions in assisted living, senior living, hospitals, jails, schools, and medical centers. We are a people-minded organization that offers flexible schedules, W2 Employment, aggressive pay rates, and benefits; while advancing our employee's careers. If you are looking for a flexible work schedule where you work on your day and your time, while being able to represent Nurse Advantage values....then we want to talk with you! Our positions have great benefits including overtime opportunities, referral and incentive bonuses, and employee recognition programs. CAREADVANTAGEINC.COM Stop Looking Anywhere Else!
